title: Google\Cloud\StorageTransfer\V1\LoggingConfig
name: LoggingConfig
description:
Specifies the logging behavior for transfer operations.

For cloud-to-cloud transfers, logs are sent to Cloud Logging. See Read transfer logs for details. For transfers to or from a POSIX file system, logs are stored in the Cloud Storage bucket that is the source or sink of the transfer. See [Managing Transfer for on-premises jobs] (https://cloud.google.com/storage-transfer/docs/managing-on-prem-jobs#viewing-logs) for details.

Generated from protobuf message google.storagetransfer.v1.LoggingConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.log_actions
params.description: Specifies the actions to be logged. If empty, no logs are generated. Not supported for transfers with PosixFilesystem data sources; use [enable_onprem_gcs_transfer_logs][google.storagetransfer.v1.LoggingConfig.enable_onprem_gcs_transfer_logs] instead.

params.name: data.log_action_states
params.description: States in which log_actions are logged. If empty, no logs are generated. Not supported for transfers with PosixFilesystem data sources; use [enable_onprem_gcs_transfer_logs][google.storagetransfer.v1.LoggingConfig.enable_onprem_gcs_transfer_logs] instead.

params.name: data.enable_onprem_gcs_transfer_logs
params.description: For transfers with a PosixFilesystem source, this option enables the Cloud Storage transfer logs for this transfer.

methods.name: getLogActions
methods.description:
Specifies the actions to be logged. If empty, no logs are generated.

Not supported for transfers with PosixFilesystem data sources; use [enable_onprem_gcs_transfer_logs][google.storagetransfer.v1.LoggingConfig.enable_onprem_gcs_transfer_logs] instead.
